name: Mashed Potatoes With Garlic and Basil
keywords: basil, potato, gluten-free, low cholesterol, low-sodium, nut-free, vegetarian, side dish
recipeIngredient: 6 to 8 medium Washington, Idaho or Yellow Gold potatoes

recipeInstructions.text: Peel the potatoes and cut them into 3/4-inch cubes. Place the pieces in saucepan and cover with water. Add the garlic and salt.
Bring to a boil and simmer for 15 minutes or until the potatoes are tender. Do not overcook.
Drain. Discard garlic. Put the potatoes through a food mill or ricer, or mash them well with a potato masher.
Add the olive oil, and beat to blend. Add the warm milk, basil and pepper. Blend well. Serve piping hot.
